image_1.entity_name: A shelter at a children’s hospital in Kyiv
image_1.description: Country invaded by Russia, leading to sanctions and a global response against Moscow.
image_1.reason: The image depicts a makeshift shelter or temporary living space, which is consistent with the context of displacement and emergency due to the invasion of Ukraine. The text also mentions a shelter at a children's hospital in Kyiv, which aligns with the image content.

image_2.description: Kharkiv is Ukraine's second-largest city and has experienced bombardment, including the use of internationally banned cluster munitions, resulting in civilian casualties.
image_2.reason: The image depicts a collage of photographs, one of which shows a person carrying a backpack with the number '1354' written on it.

image_3.description: An opera by Gioachino Rossini, depicted with two large green mustaches forming an arch over a sandy ground with a small figure standing beneath them, under a cloudy sky.
image_3.reason: The image clearly shows the promotional poster for 'The Barber of Seville' by Gioachino Rossini, which is one of the five operas featured in the image. The illustration matches the description provided in the text.
